sn14.35:1.2: “Mendicants, if you take pleasure in the earth element, you take pleasure in suffering.
sn14.35:1.3: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn14.35:1.4: If you take pleasure in the water element …
sn14.35:1.5: If you take pleasure in the fire element …
sn14.35:1.6: If you take pleasure in the air element, you take pleasure in suffering.
sn14.35:1.7: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn14.35:2.1: If you don’t take pleasure in the earth element, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.
sn14.35:2.2: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.
sn14.35:2.3: If you don’t take pleasure in the water element …
sn14.35:2.4: If you don’t take pleasure in the fire element …
sn14.35:2.5: If you don’t take pleasure in the air element, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.
sn14.35:2.6: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.”
